hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Map Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Souls of the Anubis# can be found in #the Market#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Soul of  Morpha#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Soul of the Dark Link#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Morpha# holds...^ #the Soul of Bongo Bongo# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.
